wikipedia_page.main: Professor Reginald "Rex" Charles Coates (28 June 1920 – 22 November 2004) was a British civil engineer, academic and the 114th president of the Institution of Civil Engineers.

response: * Reginald Coates, Professor of Civil Engineering from 1983 to 2004 at the University of Nottingham and President from 1978–79 of the Institution of Civil Engineers

response: * Reginald Coates - civil engineer and former President of the Institution of Civil Engineers
